arch.description: (optional) [ppc64le|s390x] allows pipeline to be adapted for non x86 cluster (empty means x86 which is the default)

cdp_version.description: cpd version to set as default in your pipelines

default_cpd_install.description: adapt pipeline default parameter for cpd or watsonx

default_olm_utils_image.description: (optional) default olm utils image to use (without tag)

storageClass.description: Set the default StorageClass to use in the cpd-install pipelines

http_proxy.description: proxy to use for http connections

https_proxy.description: proxy to use for https connections

no_proxy.description: IP, networks and domain which will should be reached directly (without proxy)

airgap.description: Disconnected installation using a private registry

enabled.description: Activate options for disconnected (private registry) installation

private_registry_secret.description: docker secret for the private registry which contain cp.icr.io mirror (when airgap_mode is enabled)

enabled.description: Enable patching of openshift-pipeline for cpd-install-pipeline (default-timeout-minutes,enum)

defaultTimeoutMinutes.description: default timeout in minutes for a pipeline

activateEnum.description: Activate the enum feature for pipeline form (alpha)
